mapper.select: select a.PROD_NO, a.MEM_NO, a.CATE_SUB_ID, a.PROD_NAME, a.PROD_PRICE, a.PROD_NEWING from product a, member b where a.mem_no = b.mem_no and a.prod_name like '%'||#{searchText}||'%' or a.mem_no = b.mem_no and b.mem_alias like '%'||#{searchText}||'%'

SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONT, TO_CHAR(NOTICE_AT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as NOTICE_AT, NOTICE_CNT FROM NOTICE_BOARD WHERE NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%' OR NOTICE_CONT LIKE '%'||#{searchText}||'%' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
